methods.name: defaults
methods.description: Extends plugin default settings; effects instances created hereafter.

methods.name: resizeInstance
methods.description: Resizes layout on instance of plugin

methods.name: scroll
methods.description: Scrolls instance of plugin to element or position

params.name: position
params.description: Target element selector or static position

name: Scrollbar
use:
### Basic Scrollbar will allow you to customize the visible scrollbar on overflow content. ```javascript $(".target").scrollbar(); ``` ```markup

...

``` ### Horizontal ```javascript $(".target").scrollbar({ horizontal: true }); ```
demo:
Basic
